title: Add rate limiting to API endpoints
description: Implement rate limiting for API endpoints to prevent abuse. Use slowapi or similar middleware to add configurable rate limits per API key.
acceptance_criteria: Rate limiting middleware is implemented using slowapi
Default rate limit is 100 requests per minute per API key
Rate limits are configurable via environment variables
Rate limit headers are included in responses (X-RateLimit-*)
429 Too Many Requests returned when limit exceeded
Unit tests verify rate limiting behavior
implementation_notes: Use slowapi library for FastAPI rate limiting
Rate limit by API key, not by IP
Consider different limits for different endpoint types
Add rate limit status to health check
